channel.title: Talking trash on DHS through twitter or facebook a no no?
channel.description:
[url]https://outfront.blogs.cnn.com/2012/02/10/dhs-reading-your-tweets-and-facebook-posts-paul-callan-calls-it-very-very-frightening/?hpt=hp_t3[/url]
This article claims that if you talk trash about the DHS on your twitter and/or facebook you could be put on a watch list or something.
What do you guys think?
Personally I'm just gonna live my life and watch all the words fly through the air from a safe distance.
None the less, if this is true I find it interesting enough to keep watch on.
